statements: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE item_name = 'Laptop' AND id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE resources SET unit_price = 15.99 WHERE resource_id = 5;

UPDATE resources SET unit_price = 25.50, category = 'Electronics' WHERE resource_id = 200;

UPDATE materials SET unit_price = unit_price * 1.10 WHERE material_id = 201;
